name: A'Cute Angle
description:
A game by Ben and Divya for the TriJam #111 gamejam.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Goal: Match the white triangle with the outlined red triangle using the control keys. Score is calculated based on level and remaining time.

Red outline: no matches
Yellow outline: 1 or more points match

Source code available here: https://codepen.io/tsuhre/pen/PobVevq
